title: Cheriya Manushyarum Valiya Lokavum | ചെറിയ ലോകവും വലിയ മനുഷ്യരും
description: Cheriya Manushyarum Valiya Lokavum (Small Men and the Big World) is a cartoon by the film director G. Aravindan.[1] The serial cartoon was published in the last page of Mathrubhumi in the 1960s and 70s.The cartoon dealt with the adventures of the central characters Ramu and Guruji, literally depicted the socio-political and cultural issues of Kerala with a very special satiric touch.
author: G. Aravindan
